competitors.name: Drip

context: In 2015, Klaviyo (founded 2012) was competing in an established email marketing landscape dominated by players like Mailchimp and Constant Contact. The market featured both all-in-one platforms (HubSpot, ActiveCampaign) and more specialized ecommerce-focused tools (Drip). Klaviyo was positioning itself as a data-driven email marketing platform specifically built for ecommerce businesses.
